parameter.name: Environment
parameter.description: Enter one of the following environment values: development, staging, or production.

parameter.name: servicesURL
parameter.description: Enter one of the following URL values: development, staging, or production.

parameter.name: GISServiceURL
parameter.description: Enter one of the following environment values: development, staging, or production.

parameter.name: locationURL
parameter.description: Enter one of the following environment values: development, staging, or production.

parameter.name: uploadServiceURL
parameter.description: Enter one of the following environment values: development, staging, or production.

parameter.name: clientType
parameter.description: Enter one of the following environment values: development, staging, or production.

parameter.name: reportServerURL
parameter.description: Enter one of the following environment values: development, staging, or production.

parameter.name: CWBreportServerURL
parameter.description: Enter one of the following environment values: development, staging, or production.

parameter.name: ELMAH SQL Connection String
parameter.description: Enter a SqlClient connection string for the DIT ELMAH database (typically using the elmahlogger account).

parameter.name: ELMAH Application Name
parameter.description: Enter one of the following (matching the target environment): the app.

parameter.name: ELMAH MVC Handler Allowed Roles
parameter.description: Enter the Richmond Active Directory Group authorized to view the elmah web handler.

parameter.name: ViewerRole
parameter.description: Enter the Richmond Active Directory Group authorized to view the application.

parameter.name: EditorRole
parameter.description: Enter the Richmond Active Directory Group authorized to view the application.

parameter.name: AdministratorRole
parameter.description: Enter the Richmond Active Directory Group authorized to view the application.
